verbs.description: with [V: fred] [ARG1: wilpon] now involved mets could select a new gm as soon as this week with fred wilpon now involved in the gm interview process it is becoming more clear how the mets will proceed in choosing a new leader for their baseball operations department here a rundown of each candidate chances andy martino mets van wagenen peter alonso new york mets chaim bloom doug melvin mlb casey close new york baseball fred wilpon gm brodie van wagenen
